titleStmt.title: SII 13.76: original edition by G.V. Srinivasa Rao
No. 76. (A.R. No. 168 of 1929.) GŌVINDAPUTTŪR, UDAYARPALAYAM TALUK, TRICHINOPOLY DISTRICT. ON THE SOUTH WALL OF THE CENTRAL SHRINE, GAṄGĀJAṬĀDHARA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This is an inscription of Rājarāja I, the details of the date given here viz. 3rd year, Tulā, Monday, Navamī, Tirūvōṇam, corresponding to 3rd October, A.D. 987. It records an agreement (Oṭṭōlai) given by the assembly (Peruṅguṟi-perumakkaḷ) of Periya Śrī Vāṉavaṉmahādēvi-chaturvēdimaṅgalam, in consideration of a lump sum of 200 kaḻañju, to pay all the taxes due on a vēli and quarter of land endowed for worship to the temple at Vijayamaṅgalam by Ambalavaṉ Paḻuvūr Nakkaṉ alias Vikramaśōḻa-Mahārājaṉ of Kuvaḷālam, a nobleman of Mummuḍi-Chōḷadēva, who had also built the Śrīvimāna of the god with stone. The assembly is stated to have met in full strength for this transaction in front of the temple of Vinaiyābharaṇaviṇṇagar-Emberumāṉ in the centre of the village, after due announcement of its sitting by beat of drum and blowing of trumpet. The donor has figured as an important personage in the inscriptions of Uttama-Chōḷa.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . kovirājakesaripanmaṟkku yāṇṭu munṟāvatu vaṭakarai brahmateyam periya
śrīvāṉavaṉmātevi caturvetimaṅkalattu peruṅkuṟip perumakkaḷom I
yāṭṭai tulā nāyaṟṟut tiṅkaḷkiḻamaiyumṇ navamiyum peṟṟa tiruvoṇattiṉ ṉāṉ
ṟu pakal brahmatthāṉattey taṭṭaḻi koṭṭik kāḷam mūti dharmmi ceytu naṭuvil śrī koyi
llāṉa viṉaiyābharaṇa viṇṇakaremperumāṉaṭikaḷ śrīkoyiliṉ muṉpil kūṭatte
y peruṅkuṟi kūṭṭa kuṟaivaṟak kūṭiIruntu paṇippaṇiyāl paṇittu I śrīvijayamaṅkalam muṭai
ya paramasvāmikku Oṭṭi Iṟaikāval loṭṭolai Iṭṭu kuṭutta paricāvatu Ipparama
svāmikku śrīvimāṉam kallāle Eḻuntaruḷuvittāṉ Uṭaiyār śrīmummu
ṭiccoḷa tevar peruntarattu kuvaḷḷālammuṭaiyāṉ Ampalavaṉ paḻuvūr
nakkaṉāna vikramacoḻamahārājaṉ Ipparamasvāmikku Epperpaṭṭa tiruvārāyiṉaikaḷukkumāka koṇ
ṭu kuṭutta nilamāvatu pala taṭiyāl taṉtarattu maṭakki vanta nilam Oṉṟekā
l Ivvoṉṟekāl nilattukkum cantirātittaval Iṟaikāvallāka Ivvikrama coḻamārā
yariṭai mahāsabhaiyoṅ koṇṭa poṉ kaḻantiṟ pertta tuḷaipoṉ kācu niṟai poṉ
Irunūṟṟu kaḻaiñcu Ippoṉ Irunūṟṟu kaḻaiñcāka cellak koṇṭu Itaṉ cuṭṭappaṭṭa palata
ṭiyāl taṉtarattu maṭakki vanta Ivvoṉṟekāl nilattālum vācallil ponta kuṭimaiyum Ūriṭu varippā
ṭum Iṟaiy Eccoṟu cennir veṭṭiyum Epperpaṭṭa Iṟaiyuñ cantrāātitaval Iṟai Iṟuttuk kuṭuppomā
kavum Itaṟṟiṟampil peruṅkuṟi kūṭi Iruntu Iṟai kāṭṭil devakanmikaḷey tāṅkaḷ veṇṭi kaḷattu taṅkaḷ veṇṭu po
ṉ maṉṟiṉāl maṉṟiṉa maṉṟupāṭṭuppoṉ maṟai Iṉṟiye Iṟuttum minnilattukku Iṟai Iṟuttu ku
ṭukka kaṭavommākavum paṇitta prāhmaṇa
ṉaiyum paṇikeṭṭa karaṇattāṉaiyum Iṟai kāṭṭiṉa karaṇattāṉaiyum tevakanmikaḷḷe perpoṉ Aympa
yampatu poṉ maṉṟi Iṟuppittālum minnilam Oṉṟekāl nilattukku cantirātittaval Iṟai Iṟuttu
kkuṭukka kaṭavomākavum mivvoṭṭolaippaṭiyey kallil veṭṭavum śāsanaṃ ceyvittu koḷḷavum pe
ṟuvārāka Oṭṭi Iṟaikāval loṭṭolai Iṭṭu kuṭuttom Ivijayamaṅkalattu paramasvāmikku vaṭa karai brahmateyam
periya śrīvāṉavaṉmātevi caturvetimaṅkalattu peruṅkuṟip perumakkaḷḷom paṇiyāl Ivviṟaikāval Oṭṭolai Eḻu
tiṉeṉ Ivvūr maddhyasthaṉ kūṭallūruṭaiyāṉ pūtaṉ kāṭaṉṉeṉ Ivai Eṉ Eḻuttu .
Digital edition of SII 13.76 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
